      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void create(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      CREATE a new admin and add it into the database file Attributes are validated before creation If attributes are not allowed, throw error and do nothing If Database file exist, existing records are read and new Admin object is aopended before saving If Database file does not exist, Admin object will be written to a new file and saved
      void deleteByEmail(java.lang.String email)
      Delete an Admin in the Database file, based on the email attribute passed
      java.util.ArrayList<Admin> read()
      READ and return every Admin in the Database file If Database file not found, ignore error and return empty list
      Admin readByEmail(java.lang.String valueToSearch)
      READ and return an Admin by searching for one with matching email in the Database file
      void replaceExistingFile(java.lang.String filename, java.util.ArrayList<Admin> returnData)
      Overwrite Database file with new data of list of Admin
      void updatePasswordHashed(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String currentPassword, java.lang.String newPassword)
      UPDATE an Admin's password in Database file Validate user's input of current password to ensure password is correct before updating it

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create(java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String password)
        CREATE a new admin and add it into the database file Attributes are validated before creation If attributes are not allowed, throw error and do nothing If Database file exist, existing records are read and new Admin object is aopended before saving If Database file does not exist, Admin object will be written to a new file and saved
        Parameters:
        username - Email of the Admin to be created
        password - Unencrypted plain text password of Admin to be created

      • read

        public java.util.ArrayList<Admin> read()
        READ and return every Admin in the Database file If Database file not found, ignore error and return empty list
        Returns:
        Model.Admin Return list of Admins if found, else empty list

      • readByEmail

        public Admin readByEmail(java.lang.String valueToSearch)
        READ and return an Admin by searching for one with matching email in the Database file
        Parameters:
        valueToSearch - Email of admin to search for
        Returns:
        Admin Return Admin if found, else null object

      • updatePasswordHashed

        public void updatePasswordHashed(java.lang.String email,
                                 java.lang.String currentPassword,
                                 java.lang.String newPassword)
        UPDATE an Admin's password in Database file Validate user's input of current password to ensure password is correct before updating it
        Parameters:
        email - Email of admin who password will be updated
        currentPassword - Current password (Unencrypted) of Admin
        newPassword - New password (Unencrypted) of Admin

      • deleteByEmail

        public void deleteByEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Delete an Admin in the Database file, based on the email attribute passed
        Parameters:
        email - Email of Admin who will be deleted

      • replaceExistingFile

        public void replaceExistingFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                java.util.ArrayList<Admin> returnData)
        Overwrite Database file with new data of list of Admin
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename to check for
        returnData - New ArrayList of Admin to be written to the file
